title: S15 Ep85: Supernatural News/Parashare:  Paranormal Disclosure Discussion Edition
itunes:title: Supernatural News/Parashare:  Paranormal Disclosure Discussion Edition
description:
Darkness Radio reports Supernatural News & ParaShare with our Paranormal Disclosure Discussion Edition!

Dave & Tim have quite a lot to share this week with weird, wild and unique stories from around the world and begin a thought provoking discussion with some strange audio they were sent from an unexpected source. This week Stormy Daniels is Ghost Hunting, broken hearted spirit lovers, curses and more! Find out what Miley, Demi and Khloe share in common that might surprise you. Dave invites you to a THRILLER of a Halloween event. All that PLUS your stories and calls featured on the program!

Join Darkness Dave & Sign up here for the Virtual Halloween Thriller Fun Run:  https://bit.ly/3khaAAI

Get the best Paranormal Books and Swag here: https://www.amazon.com/shop/darknessradiodave

To see the news on today's show visit here: https://www.darknessradio.com/news
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
